front.title: Object Identifier Registry for the PKIX Working Group

abstract.t: When the Public-Key Infrastructure using X.509 (PKIX) Working Group was chartered, an object identifier arc was was allocated by IANA for use by that working group. This document describes the object identifiers that were assigned in that arc, it returns control of that arc to IANA, and it establishes IANA allocation policies for any future assignments within that arc.
